SELECT Z.Counseling_No , Z.Customer_No , Z.classify_mem , Z.Customer_name, Z.Main_inquiry, Z.Sub_inquiry , Z.Feedback_code, Z.MAIN_DEPT, Z.SUB_DEPT , Z.DEPT_CODE, Z.SUB_DEPT_CDE , Z.Status ,TO_CHAR (Z.Reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') Reg_date ,z.ord_no,z.hc_mem_id
FROM ( SELECT A.CUR_SEQNO Counseling_No , A.CUST_NO as Customer_No , DECODE(FN_GET_COMMCD(1, TGT_DVCD), '', FN_GET_COMMCD(8, TGT_DVCD), FN_GET_COMMCD(1, TGT_DVCD)) AS classify_mem , A.CUST_NM Customer_name , CALLCENTERUSER.FN_CNSL_CD_NM(A.CNSL_LRGCLAS_CD, 'ms-MY') AS Main_inquiry , CALLCENTERUSER.FN_CNSL_CD_NM(A.CNSL_MEDCLAS_CD, 'ms-MY') AS Sub_inquiry , CALLCENTERUSER.FN_CNSL_CD_NM(A.CNSL_SMLCLAS_CD, 'ms-MY') AS Feedback_code , DECODE(B.MAIN_DEPT,'',CALLCENTERUSER.FN_ERP_TAG_DEPT_NM('M', A.DEPT_CODE) , B.MAIN_DEPT ) AS MAIN_DEPT , DECODE(B.SUB_DEPT,'',CALLCENTERUSER.FN_ERP_TAG_DEPT_NM('S', A.SUB_DEPT_CDE) , B.SUB_DEPT) AS SUB_DEPT , A.DEPT_CODE , A.SUB_DEPT_CDE , A.Ord_no , DECODE(B.STUS_CODE_ID, '', 'Active', CALLCENTERUSER.FN_ERP_GET_STUS_NM(B.STUS_CODE_ID)) as Status , to_date(Substr(a.REG_DTM, 1, 8 ),'YYYY/MM/DD') Reg_date , a.hc_mem_id FROM CALLCENTERUSER.T_CUR_HIST A LEFT OUTER JOIN GBSLCVD.CCR0006D B ON A.CUR_SEQNO = B.CUR_SEQ_NO WHERE A.TR_DVCD = 'T' ) Z WHERE 1=1
AND Z.Customer_name = upper(#{customer})
AND LOWER(Z.main_inquiry) = LOWER(#{main_inquiry})
AND LOWER(Z.sub_inquiry) = LOWER(#{sub_inquiry})
AND LOWER(Z.Counseling_No)= LOWER(#{counseling_no})
AND LOWER(Z.MAIN_DEPT) = LOWER(#{main_department})
AND LOWER(Z.sub_dept) = LOWER(#{sub_department})
AND LOWER(Z.Feedback_code) = LOWER(#{feedback_code})
and TO_CHAR (Z.Reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE (#{regDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT Z.Counseling_No , Z.Customer_No , Z.classify_mem , Z.Customer_name, Z.Main_inquiry, Z.Sub_inquiry , Z.Feedback_code, Z.MAIN_DEPT, Z.SUB_DEPT , Z.DEPT_CODE, Z.SUB_DEPT_CDE , Z.Status ,TO_CHAR (Z.Reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') Reg_date ,z.ord_no, z.hc_mem_id, z.ORD_ID, z.hc_id
FROM ( SELECT A.CUR_SEQNO Counseling_No , A.CUST_NO as Customer_No , DECODE(FN_GET_COMMCD(1, TGT_DVCD), '', FN_GET_COMMCD(8, TGT_DVCD), FN_GET_COMMCD(1, TGT_DVCD)) AS classify_mem , A.CUST_NM Customer_name , CALLCENTERUSER.FN_CNSL_CD_NM(A.CNSL_LRGCLAS_CD, 'ms-MY') AS Main_inquiry , CALLCENTERUSER.FN_CNSL_CD_NM(A.CNSL_MEDCLAS_CD, 'ms-MY') AS Sub_inquiry , CALLCENTERUSER.FN_CNSL_CD_NM(A.CNSL_SMLCLAS_CD, 'ms-MY') AS Feedback_code , CALLCENTERUSER.FN_ERP_TAG_DEPT_NM('M', A.DEPT_CODE) AS MAIN_DEPT , CALLCENTERUSER.FN_ERP_TAG_DEPT_NM('S', A.SUB_DEPT_CDE) AS SUB_DEPT , A.DEPT_CODE , A.SUB_DEPT_CDE , A.Ord_no , DECODE(B.STUS_CODE_ID, '', 'Active', CALLCENTERUSER.FN_ERP_GET_STUS_NM(B.STUS_CODE_ID)) as Status , to_date(Substr(a.REG_DTM, 1, 8 ),'YYYY/MM/DD') Reg_date , a.hc_mem_id , a.ORD_ID, a.hc_id FROM CALLCENTERUSER.T_CUR_HIST A LEFT OUTER JOIN GBSLCVD.CCR0006D B ON A.CUR_SEQNO = B.CUR_SEQ_NO WHERE A.TR_DVCD = 'T' ) Z WHERE 1=1 and z.Counseling_No = #{counselingId}
SELECT CALL_ENTRY_ID FROM CCR0006D WHERE CUR_SEQ_NO = #{counselingNo} and ROWNUM < = 1

SELECT MAIN_DEPT main_department, SUB_DEPT sub_department , CALLCENTERUSER.FN_ERP_GET_STUS_NM(CALL_STUS_ID) status_Nm ,TO_CHAR(CALL_CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') crt_Date , CALL_REM FROM GBSLCVD.CCR0007D where Call_stus_id in (1,10,34,35,36,44) and CALL_ENTRY_ID = #{callEntryId}
